EMAC_CHAN_MAC_ADDR_tag Struct Reference
EMAC LLD Module API » EMAC LLD Data Structures

Used to Initialize the Emac Driver Instance with mac addresses and channel information. More...

#include <emac_drv.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t chan_num
 
uint32_t num_of_mac_addrs
 
EMAC_MAC_ADDR_T * p_mac_addr
 

Detailed Description

Used to Initialize the Emac Driver Instance with mac addresses and channel information.

This configuration structure is a field of EMAC_OPEN_CONFIG_INFO_T and used to configure the driver with channel and mac addreses information

Field Documentation

uint32_t EMAC_CHAN_MAC_ADDR_tag::chan_num

channel number configured for this core

uint32_t EMAC_CHAN_MAC_ADDR_tag::num_of_mac_addrs

Total number of MAC addresses configured for this channel

EMAC_MAC_ADDR_T* EMAC_CHAN_MAC_ADDR_tag::p_mac_addr

Pointer to the MAC addresses configured for this channel EMAC_MAC_ADDR_T
